          <title>
            <string language="en">pBR322</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">pBR322</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pBR322</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pBR322</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pBR322</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">pBR322</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pBR322</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the plasmid pBR322 which carries the genes coding for ampicillin and tetracycline resistance and target sites for different restriction enzymes</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pbr322</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plasmid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">restriction enzyme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">target site</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tetracycline</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Plasmid pBR322, welches
die Gene trägt, die für Ampicillin- und Tetracyclinwiderstands- und 
-zielsites für unterschiedliche Beschränkung Enzyme codieren</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le plasmide pBR322 ce 
qui porte les gènes codant pour des sites d'ampicilline et de 
résistance et de cible de tétracycline pour différentes enzymes de 
restriction</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o plasmid pBR322 qual 
carrega os genes que codificam para locais do ampicillin e da 
resistência e do alvo do tetracycline para enzymes diferentes da 
limitação</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il plasmide pBR322 
quale trasporta i geni che codificano per i luoghi dell'ampicillina e 
di resistenza e dell'obiettivo della tetraciclina per gli enzimi 
differenti di limitazione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το πλασμίδιο pBR322 που
φέρνει τα γονίδια κωδικοποιώντας για ampicillin και 
tetracycline αντίστασης και στόχων τις περιοχές για τα 
διαφορετικά ένζυμα περιορισμού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el plasmid pBR322 cuál
lleva los genes que cifran para los sitios de la ampicilina y de la 
resistencia y de la blanco del tetracycline para diversas enzimas de 
la restricción</string>
          </description>
